statements: SELECT * FROM project_risks
SELECT risk_id, risk_description FROM project_risks WHERE risk_owner = 'John Doe'
SELECT risk_description, mitigation_strategy FROM project_risks ORDER BY risk_id DESC
SELECT * FROM project_risks WHERE risk_owner LIKE '%Alice%'
SELECT risk_id, risk_owner FROM project_risks ORDER BY risk_id ASC
SELECT * FROM project_risks WHERE risk_owner = 'John Smith';
SELECT risk_id, risk_description FROM project_risks WHERE risk_owner = 'Emily Brown' ORDER BY risk_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM project_risks WHERE risk_description LIKE '%delay%';
SELECT risk_id, risk_description, mitigation_strategy FROM project_risks WHERE risk_owner = 'Alex Green' AND risk_description != 'Low';
SELECT * FROM project_risks WHERE risk_owner = 'Sarah White' AND risk_description LIKE '%budget%' ORDER BY risk_id;
SELECT * FROM project_risks;
SELECT risk_description, mitigation_strategy FROM project_risks WHERE risk_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM project_risks WHERE risk_owner = 'Alice';
SELECT risk_id, risk_description FROM project_risks ORDER BY risk_id DESC;
SELECT owner_name, contact_email FROM risk_owners;
SELECT * FROM project_risks WHERE risk_owner = 'John Doe';
SELECT risk_description, mitigation_strategy FROM project_risks WHERE risk_owner = 'Jane Smith';
SELECT risk_id, risk_description, risk_owner FROM project_risks WHERE risk_description LIKE '%critical%';
SELECT * FROM risk_owners WHERE owner_name = 'Alice Brown';
SELECT owner_name, contact_email FROM risk_owners WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM risks;
SELECT risk_id, risk_description, risk_category FROM risks WHERE risk_likelihood > 2;
SELECT risk_description, risk_impact FROM risks WHERE risk_category = 'Financial' ORDER BY risk_impact DESC;
SELECT * FROM mitigation_strategies WHERE strategy_status = 'Implemented';
SELECT owner_name, owner_email FROM risk_owners;
SELECT * FROM risks ORDER BY risk_likelihood DESC, risk_impact ASC;
SELECT risk_description, risk_category FROM risks WHERE risk_category = 'Financial';
SELECT rs.strategy_description, rs.strategy_owner, r.risk_category FROM mitigation_strategies rs JOIN risks r ON rs.risk_id = r.risk_id WHERE rs.strategy_status = 'Active';

SELECT ro.owner_name, ro.owner_email, COUNT(rs.strategy_id) AS strategy_count FROM risk_owners ro LEFT JOIN mitigation_strategies rs ON ro.owner_id = rs.risk_id GROUP BY ro.owner_name, ro.owner_email;

SELECT r.risk_description, rs.strategy_description, ro.owner_name FROM risks r JOIN mitigation_strategies rs ON r.risk_id = rs.risk_id JOIN risk_owners ro ON rs.strategy_owner = ro.owner_name WHERE r.risk_status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM Risk;
SELECT name, description FROM Risk WHERE likelihood='High';
SELECT id, name, description FROM Risk WHERE impact='Medium' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, likelihood FROM Risk WHERE likelihood='Low' AND impact='High';
SELECT r.name AS RiskName, m.strategy AS MitigationStrategy FROM Risk r INNER JOIN Mitigation m ON r.id = m.risk_id;
SELECT * FROM Risk WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name FROM Mitigation WHERE risk_id = 1 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Strategy WHERE name LIKE '%Risk%';
SELECT id, contact FROM Owner WHERE role = 'Manager' OR role = 'Owner' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, description FROM Risk WHERE likelihood = 'High' AND impact = 'Severe';
SELECT * FROM project WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM project WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM project WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date FROM project WHERE project_id BETWEEN 2 AND 5;
SELECT project_id, project_name, end_date FROM project WHERE project_name LIKE '%database%';
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM project WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM project WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM project WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project WHERE project_name LIKE 'S%' OR project_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT project_id, project_name, end_date FROM project WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-06-01' AND '2022-06-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
